cellularland1

Class GridController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cellularland1.GridController

  • public class GridController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller of the grid with the main board. It controls the actions taken after clicking on a button in the board and provides an interface for access to the specific nodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GridController(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid, ManaController mc)
      Constructor that initializes the gird.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GridController

        public GridController(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid,
                      ManaController mc)
        Constructor that initializes the gird. It adds the array buttons as children of the grid container. At first, all the nodes are hidden yet.
